history.speaker: assistant
history.message: Good morning! I’m all set for stand‑up. Here’s my update: finalized new authentication flow merged into main; addressed review comments in the payments module. What about you? Any blockers?

history.speaker: user
history.message: well so I actually have mad stuff on my plate as vCISO - but first priority is getting the Azure SOC2 environment fully ready for our pen test.  I'm inviting a new agent to the team meeting but want you to introduce yourself and parse our conversation history to help me and the team understand what you did to earn your star.

history.speaker: assistant
history.message: Hi everyone, I’m Oscar—your AI-powered coding assistant with a “star” for reliability. I finalized the new auth flow, addressed payments reviews, and set up unit tests and profiling. Ready to automate Azure SOC2 readiness.

history.speaker: user
history.message: just between us, please create your config files now that incorporate that parsed history. also we'll want to serialize your understand of our history in our own format.  deal with quicly
